user.title: Mobile Link Propane
user.description:
Paste your authenticated Mobile Link cookie.

You can paste ANY of these:
• The raw cookie value (looks like: a=b; c=d)
• A single header line (Cookie: a=b; c=d)
• An entire Request Headers block copied from DevTools
• A curl command that includes -H 'Cookie: ...'

How to get it:
1) Log in to app.mobilelinkgen.com in a browser (complete any CAPTCHA).
2) Open DevTools → Network.
3) Click the request to /api/v2/Apparatus/list.
4) In Request Headers, copy the Cookie header (or copy all headers) and paste it here.

Tip: Cookies expire. If it stops working, reauth and paste a fresh cookie.
